Verses: 1 naalaiyathdhinaththaik Kuriththup Perumaipaaraattaadhe; Orunaal Pirappippadhai Ariyaaye.
2 un Vaai Alla, Puraththiyaane Unnaip Pugazhattum; Un Udhadu Alla, Anniyane Unnaip Pugazhattum.
3 kal Ganamum, Manal Baaramumaayirukkum; Moodanudaiya Kobamo Ivvirandilum Baaramaam.
4 ukkiram Kodumaiyulladhu, Kobam Nishtooramulladhu; Poraamaiyovendraal, Adharku Munnirkaththakkavan Yaar?
5 maraivaana Snegaththaippaarkkilum Velippadaiyaana Kadindhukolludhal Nalladhu.
6 snegidhan Adikkum Adigal Unmaiyaanavaigal; Saththuru Idum Muththangalo Vanjanaiyullavaigal.
7 thrupthiyadaindhavan Thenkoottaiyum Midhippaan; Pasiyullavanukko Kasappaana Padhaarththangalum Thiththippaayirukkum.
8 than Koottaivittu Alaigira Kuruvi Eppadiyirukkiradho, Appadiye Than Sthaanaththaivittu Alaigira Manushanum Irukkiraan.
9 parimalathailamum Sugandhadhoobamum Irudhayaththaik Kalippaakkuvadhupola, Oruvanudaiya Snegidhan Utkaruththaana Aalosanaiyinaal Paaraattum Inbamaanadhu Kalippaakkum.

10 un Snegidhanaiyum, Un Thagappanudaiya Snegidhanaiyum Vittuvidaadhe; Un Aabaththukkaalaththil Un Sagodharanudaiya Veettirkup Pogaadhe; Dhooraththilulla Sagodharanilum Sameebaththilulla Ayalaane Vaasi.
11 en Magane, Ennai Nindhikkiravanukku Naan Uththaravukodukkaththakkadhaaga, Nee Gnaanavaanaagi, En Irudhayaththai Sandhoshappaduththu.
12 vivegi Aabaththaik Kandu Maraindhukollugiraan; Pedhaigalo Nedugappoi Dhandikkappadugiraargal.
13 anniyanukkaagap Pinaippadugiravanudaiya Vasthiraththai Eduththukkol, Anniya Sthreekkaaga Eeduvaangikkol.
14 oruvan Adhikaalaiyile Ezhundhu Uraththasaththaththode Than Snegidhanukku Sollum Aaseervaadham Saabamaaga Ennappadum.
15 adaimazhainaalil Oyaadha Ozhukkum Sandaikkaariyaana Sthreeyum Sari.
16 avalai Adakkappaarkkiravan Kaatrai Adakkith Than Valadhukaiyinaal Enneyaip Pidikkappaarkkiraan.
17 irumbai Irumbu Karukkidum; Appadiye Manushanum Than Snegidhanudaiya Mugaththaik Karukkidugiraan.
18 aththimaraththaik Kaakkiravan Adhin Kaniyaip Pusippaan; Than Ejamaanaik Kaakkiravan Ganamadaivaan.
19 thanneeril Mugaththukku Mugam Oththirukkumaappola, Manusharil Irudhayaththirku Irudhayam Oththirukkum.
20 paadhaalamum Azhivum Thrupthiyaagiradhillai; Adhupola Manushanudaiya Kangalum Thrupthiyaagiradhillai.
21 vellikkuk Kugaiyum, Ponnukkup Pudamum Sodhanai; Manushanukku Avanukku Undaagum Pugazhchchiye Sodhanai.
22 moodanai Uralil Pottu Ulakkaiyinaal Noiyode Noiyaagak Kuththinaalum, Avanudaiya Moodaththanam Avanai Vittu Neengaadhu.
23 un Aadugalin Nilaimaiyai Nandraai Arindhukol; Un Mandhaigalinmel Gavanamaayiru.
24 selvam Endraikkum Nilaiyaadhu; Kreedam Thalaimurai Thalaimuraidhorum Nilainirkumo?
25 pul Mulaikkum, Pachchilaigal Thondrum, Malaippoondugal Serkkappadum.
26 aattukkuttigal Unakku Vasthiraththaiyum, Kadaakkal Vayal Vaangaththakka Kirayaththaiyum Kodukkum.
27 vellaattuppaal Un Aagaaraththukkum, Un Veettaarin Aagaaraththukkum, Un Velaikkaarigalin Pizhaippukkum Podhumaanapadiyirukkum.
